# Welcome to Hextra Basic

This is a basic test repository for verifying Hextra theme integration in DocBuilder.

## Features

- Simple markdown content
- Front matter metadata
- Basic documentation structure

## Getting Started

Check out the [guide](guide.md) to learn more.
